value.name: Black Tassel
value.desc: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

imgDesc.text: Windwail Highland: Adventurers' Camp at the entrance to Dragonspine

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
It is said that some blacksmiths are apt to bestow their finest weapons upon all sorts of warriors so that they might test them to their very limits. In the process, the most experienced among them have inadvertently learned much about hitherto unfamiliar fighting techniques, some of which have even found their way into their card playing...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Your Support Zone starts with 1 "Dunyarzad" card.</color>
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: When Dunyarzad is on the field, the cost of playing Companion Cards will be reduced!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Fatui Pyro Agent
customize.desc:
"Blade of Settlement" Agent

"There is no running from your debt, be you living or otherwise."

customize.name: Mirror Maiden
customize.desc:
"Snezhnayan Maiden" Mirror Enovy

All secrets shall be concealed within the mirror of glaring brightness…

customize.name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
customize.desc:
"Cicin of the Hollow Mist" Cryo Cicin Mage

And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.

customize.name: Layla
customize.desc:
"Fantastical Evening Star" Layla

As night falls, the stars swirl and the moon wanders amidst dreams.

customize.name: Diluc
customize.desc:
"Dark Side of Dawn" Diluc

His heart is his greatest foe.

customize.name: Xiangling
customize.desc:
"Exquisite Delicacy" Xiangling

As a chef, she is practically omnipotent.

customize.name: Light's Remit
customize.desc:
Layla: Light's Remit

"My guiding stars."

customize.name: Light's Remit
customize.desc:
Layla: Light's Remit

"My guiding stars."

customize.name: Flowing Flame
customize.desc:
Diluc: Flowing Flame

A simple way out of perilous situations.

customize.name: Flowing Flame
customize.desc:
Diluc: Flowing Flame

A simple way out of perilous situations.

customize.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
customize.desc:
Composed: Sacrificial Greatsword

This greatsword has seen the passage of many years, and was once owned by a clan of brave and gifted warriors who fought hard and died young.

customize.name: Wolf's Gravestone
customize.desc:
Mountain Trail: Wolf's Gravestone

A longsword said to have been used by the knight of the north wind. It became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

customize.name: Beacon of the Reed Sea
customize.desc:
Desert Watch: Beacon of the Reed Sea

"On top of the ruins of the pool where the regalia of past executions of offenders was excavated, those who had lost the dream of the desert, yet were unwilling to give up their vast sea of sand gathered.

In the name of the Reed Sea that never existed, they connected with the dream that was promised to them..."

customize.name: Paimon
customize.desc:
Paimon, the Best Guide

"That's right! Your fortune is Paimon's fortune! And vice versa, Paimon's fortune is also your fortune."

customize.name: Paimon
customize.desc:
Paimon, the Best Guide

"That's right! Your fortune is Paimon's fortune! And vice versa, Paimon's fortune is also your fortune."

customize.name: Katheryne
customize.desc:
Katheryne, Guild Receptionist

"Ad astra abyssosque! Welcome to the Adventurers' Guild."

customize.name: Wagner
customize.desc:
Wagner, Blacksmith

"Smithing is not dependent on brute strength. You need the sweat on your brow from constant hard work, and perseverance stronger than the metals we forge!"

customize.name: Ellin
customize.desc:
"Knightly Dream" Ellin

"I've got to hone my spirit and strength both if my sword arm is to be as steady as Master Jean's!"

customize.name: Ellin
customize.desc:
"Knightly Dream" Ellin

"I've got to hone my spirit and strength both if my sword arm is to be as steady as Master Jean's!"

customize.name: Dunyarzad
customize.desc:
Purity of Trust: Dunyarzad

"The point of living is to not leave behind any regrets."

customize.name: Rana
customize.desc:
Gem of Remembrance: Rana

"We still have a lot of time with each other. We can explore the vastness of the forest, the world, and the future together."

customize.name: Rana
customize.desc:
Gem of Remembrance: Rana

"We still have a lot of time with each other. We can explore the vastness of the forest, the world, and the future together."

customize.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
customize.desc:
Lotus Flower Crisp

Dough is formed into bud-like shapes and placed into a pot of oil as if upon the surface of a lake, causing them to slowly bloom layer by layer… A pleasing sight indeed.

customize.name: Mushroom Pizza
customize.desc:
Mushroom Pizza

They say that a researcher once used very precise calculations to uncover the "fairest way to cut pizza," but as the process is far too bothersome, basically no one uses it…

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>
